style.css: position: relative;    max-width: 830px;    height: 505px;    width: 100%;    display: flex;    flex-direction: column;    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px hsl(0deg 0% 51% / 25%);    background-image: url(http://localhost:9999/images/Bg.png);    background-repeat: no-repeat;

style.css: height: 100%;    display: flex;    flex-direction: column;    align-items: flex-start;    justify-content: center;    padding: 23px;    background: linear-gradient(270deg,hsla(0,0%,100%,0) 41%,#fff 64%);

display: flex;    flex-direction: column;    align-items: flex-start;    justify-content: center;    border: 3px solid #fff;    width: 100%;    height: 100%;    padding-left: 27px;    box-sizing: border-box;
letter-spacing: .02em;    font-size: 40px;    line-height: 40px;    font-weight: 700;    color: #510C05;    max-width: 380px;    text-transform: uppercase;    overflow: hidden;
font-size: 18px;    color: #333;    color:#510C05;    font-weight: 400;    margin-top: 16px;    overflow: hidden;    max-width: 315px;    line-height: 24px;    text-align: left;

textDescription.value: You only need to leave your email here and enjoy many offers every day

style.css: font-weight: 400;    border: none;    text-transform: none;    letter-spacing: normal;    position: relative;    display: flex;    align-items: center;    cursor: text;    width: 100%;    line-height: 2.4rem;    border: none;    border-radius: 0;    outline: none;    background: transparent;    border-bottom: 1px solid #380701;

margin-top: 20px;    padding: 7px 20px;    height: 38px;    width: 180px;    display: flex;    align-items: center;    justify-content: center;    font-size: 16px;    text-align: center;    background-color: #fff;    color: #510C05;    font-weight: 500;    border: 1px solid #510C05;    cursor: pointer;    border-radius: 30px;    margin-left: 4px;
